title: Valery (Part 1)
body:
Valery (Part 1)

"Die" a woman shouted in a furious voice and slashed with her sword at the person who was standing in front of her.

The person was clad in completely black clothes and was wearing a black skeleton mask.

"Too slow" the woman heard the demonic voice of the black skeleton and the next second, the sword she was slashing was snatched away by her.

Even before she can react, she felt her head spinning and a headless body fell to the ground and disappeared from the sparring arena.

(You have successfully defeated your opponent)

(Congratulations on winning twenty matches in a row)

A light flashed as a new number appeared above Evan's head.

(Shadow Monarch, 20 Wins, 0 losses)

After seeing the number Evan nodded his head and his body also started to turn illusionary as he also disappeared from the sparring arena.

The VR pod opened and Evan came out from it.
